segments.text: I notice the water overflowing from the sink, creating a puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is standing right there, drying dishes, but she doesn't seem to notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is in the water, but she doesn't react at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the boy on the stool, reaching for the cookie jar, and it makes me nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks unstable, and he's stretching too far.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is waiting for a cookie, her hand outstretched, her eyes fixed on the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think they're going to get into trouble if the woman catches them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so calm and tidy, it's a stark contrast to the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how long the water has been overflowing and why no one has noticed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone does something about the water before it causes more damage.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's dress and apron are neat, but her surroundings are anything but.
segments.speaker: PAR
